author: JP Alegre
title: Global Nuclear Expansion Set to Fuel Surge in Uranium Demand
text:
Global nuclear power capacity is expected to grow significantly over the next decade, according to the World Energy Outlook 2024 by the International Energy Agency (IEA). The report predicts a nearly 20% increase in capacity by 2035, with China leading the expansion, accounting for almost 40% of global additions. Other countries, particularly in emerging markets, are also set to contribute to the growth as they seek reliable and low-emission electricity sources.
Nuclear power, which currently provides around 9% of global electricity, is seen as crucial for nations looking to decarbonize their power systems and enhance grid stability. The IEA highlights the role of nuclear energy in helping countries meet their net-zero targets by 2050.
With more reactors set to come online, uranium, the primary fuel used in nuclear plants, is likely to see increased demand. This anticipated growth may put a strain on uranium supply chains, which have been prone to volatility due to geopolitical factors and fluctuating market conditions.
ðŸ¤ ðŸ‚ #Uranium fuel demand for " #Nuclear power additions will accelerate over the next decade"ðŸŽï¸ðŸ”¥â›ï¸ðŸ›’ says the International #Energy Agency in their just-released World Energy Outlook 2024 ðŸ“—ðŸŒâš¡âš›ï¸ðŸ“ˆðŸ”®ðŸ‘€ 45GW added per year => over 22 Million lbs #U3O8 added demand per year!ðŸ¤¯ðŸ„â€â™‚ï¸ https://t.co/xET2cPixmL pic.twitter.com/CSIyS0U045
â€” John Quakes (@quakes99) October 16, 2024 Countries such as Canada, Kazakhstan, and Australia, major producers of uranium, are expected to benefit from this surge in demand. However, the IEA points out the need for stable and resilient supply chains to support this expansion, particularly as new nuclear projects ramp up globally.
The report also points to the potential for advanced nuclear technologies, such as small modular reactors (SMRs), which could start to come online by 2030, offering more flexibility and scalability in nuclear power generation. These innovations could further boost demand for uranium and other nuclear materials.

author: David HernÃ¡ndez
title: Ni PS5 ni PC, el genio que logrÃ³ jugar Doom Eternal en una Game Boy Color con una Raspberry Pi Pico
text:
Ni PS5 ni PC, el genio que logrÃ³ jugar Doom Eternal en una Game Boy Color con una Raspberry Pi Pico
Lo que se puede hacer con una Game Boy Color y una Raspberry Pi. Una de las cosas es disfrutar del propio Doom en la pantalla de la Game Boy.
YouTube/ChromaLock
Hay muy pocas cosas que se puedan hacer con una Game Boy Color hoy dÃ­a, pero sÃ­ que hay muchas cosas que se pueden hacer con una [Raspberry Pi](https://computerhoy.20minutos.es/tecnologia/raspberry-pi-como-funciona-sirve-pequeno-ordenador-1394282).
Si tienes cogiendo polvo tu flamante Game Boy Color en el trastero, y quieres darle un nuevo uso, lo Ãºnico que debes hacer es comprar una [Raspberry Pi Pico](https://computerhoy.20minutos.es/tecnologia/raspberry-pi-pico-vs-raspberry-pi-zero-cuales-son-diferencias-1419040), y poner en prÃ¡ctica todos tus conocimientos tecnolÃ³gicos.
AsÃ­ lo ha conseguido exactamente el youtuber llamado ChromaLock quien ha convertido la pantalla de una Game Boy Color en un monitor para juegos del calibre de [Doom](https://computerhoy.20minutos.es/gaming/hackean-nintendo-alarmo-flipper-zero-consiguen-instalar-doom-1416097).
SÃ­, ya sabemos que Doom se puede jugar en multitud de dispositivos, incluso algunos muy raros, pero que sirva nuestra Game Boy Color como un monitor para poder transmitir partidas es otra cosa.
Evidentemente, el youtuber no lo tuvo nada fÃ¡cil, porque tuvo primero que trabajar con el propio Link Cable de la Game Boy que solo puede transmitir datos a 512 kHz.
Pues tuvo que confiar en una Raspberry Pi Pico para que actÃºe como intermediario entre la partida y la visualizaciÃ³n. BÃ¡sicamente con la Raspberry Pi Pico se tomÃ³ datos de una fuente externa y se los ofreciÃ³ a la consola en un formato que pueda entenderlos.
Como puedes ver en el vÃ­deo que acompaÃ±a a noticia, algo se pudo retransmitir pero con un resultado pobre.
Esto bÃ¡sicamente tambiÃ©n se debe a la paleta de colores reducida que puede entender la Game Boy Color de la Ã©poca.
Si bien parece imposible poder disfrutar de Doom Eternal a travÃ©s de la pantalla de la Game Boy Color, al menos el usuario consiguiÃ³ su propÃ³sito aunque parece que tiene poco uso al final.
Conoce [cÃ³mo trabajamos](/como-trabajamos) en ComputerHoy.
Etiquetas: [Raspberry Pi](https://computerhoy.20minutos.es/tags/raspberry-pi)

author: @exitoina
title: Rosina de Gran Hermano cumpliÃ³ aÃ±os y Joel la sorprendiÃ³ con un ramo de flores y un beso | Exitoina
text:
Rosina BeltrÃ¡n festejÃ³ su cumpleaÃ±os en Gran Hermano , y Joel Ojeda le regalÃ³ un ramo de flores y la besÃ³ en frente de todos. Esto ocurriÃ³ luego de que ambos confesaran que tuvieron un vÃ­nculo sentimental fuera del reality .
La producciÃ³n y los hermanitos sorprendieron a la participante uruguaya con una torta y espectacular decoraciÃ³n en el jardÃ­n, y Joel terminÃ³ de alegrarla con su presente.
" Rosi, necesito que me hagas un favor. Necesito que me ayudes a devolverle a este ramo la rosa mÃ¡s linda de toda la casa ", expresÃ³ mientras le dio las flores. Ella lo abrazÃ³ y Ã©l aprovechÃ³ para darle un beso en frente de todos.
" Ay, son tremendos. Los odio. Me morÃ­ de la vergÃ¼enza... ", manifestÃ³ Rosina luego de que los jugadores pidieran que se chapen.
QuÃ© pasÃ³ entre Joel y Rosina Joel Ojeda revelÃ³ que ya seconocÃ­an con Rosina BeltrÃ¡n antes de entrar a Gran Hermano (Telefe). SucediÃ³ durante una charla donde el jugador le reprochÃ³ a su compaÃ±era haberse relacionado al mismo tiempo con otros de los jugadores "sabiendo lo que habÃ­an tenido afuera".
"Tipo, pensÃ© por qÃ© estÃ¡ acÃ¡... Es la segunda vez que el destino, tipo asÃ­", se escucha a Joel en el inicio del video capturado por la cuenta de X @vikitchh. En ese momento, Rosina lo interrumpe, sonrÃ­e y le dice: "Boludo, habÃ­amos quedado en un pacto".
"Â¿No dijimos de hablar todo afuera?" , dijo ella. "SÃ­", respondiÃ³ Ã©l. "Â¿Y entonces? No es el momento...", replicÃ³ la joven uruguaya. "Yo te quiero comentar una cosa", sumÃ³ el tripulante de cabina de aviÃ³n de 31 aÃ±os.
"A mÃ­ no me gusta exponer mis cosas pirvadas", le advirtiÃ³ Rosina a Joel. "Me vista y flasheamos los dos porque no podÃ­amos creerlo", aÃ±aÃ±Ã³. De pronto, Joel la corta y expresa: "Creo que fuiste muy imprudente sabiendo lo que nos pasÃ³ afuera, acÃ¡ te relacionaste con cuatro personas emocionalmente".
Ante el inesperado reproche, Rosina lanzÃ³ un claro "Â¿QuÃ©? Â¿CÃ³mo emocionalmente?". " SÃ­, con Alan, con Nico, con LucÃ­a. Generaste una situaciÃ³n incÃ³moda mÃ­a con ellos", le reclamÃ³.
Amenazaron a la periodista Cecilia Insinga y a sus hijos: "Voy a hacer la denuncia"

author: Louis Juricic
title: Tenon Medical Announces Issuance of Three U.S. Patents By Investing.com
text:
Further Solidifies International Patent Portfolio and Underscores the Company's Commitment to Innovation of SI Joint Stabilization Systems and Methods
Tenon Medical, Inc. (TNON) ("Tenon" or the "Company"), a company transforming care for patients suffering from certain Sacroiliac Joint (SIJ) disorders, today announced the issuance of U.S. Patent Nos. 12,115,075, 12,115,076 and 12,115,077.
U.S. Patent Nos. 12,115,075 and 12,115,076, both entitled "Sacroiliac Joint Stabilization Prostheses", are directed to Tenon's enhanced CatamaranÂ® prostheses that include unique drug delivery compositions, which enhance sealing of the prostheses in SI joint bone structures and bone growth about and within the prostheses when the prostheses are implanted in a SI joint.
U.S. Patent No. 12,115,077, entitled "Systems, Apparatus and Methods for Stabilizing Sacroiliac Joints", is directed to SI joint prostheses with unique structures and configurations to correct failed SI joint stabilization with alternative commercial SI joint implants without requiring removal of the failed implant.
The three (3) U.S. patents further enhance the Company's growing patent portfolio for its CatamaranÂ® SI Joint Fusion System, which now comprises twelve (12) issued U.S. and foreign (International) patents, and twenty-three (23) pending U.S. and foreign patent applications.
"We are pleased with the USPTO's recognition of the novel CatamaranÂ® SI joint prostheses that will provide a best in class solution to specifically address the need for revision of other ineffective SI joint devices," commented Richard Ginn, Co-Founder and Chief Technology Officer of Tenon Medical. He concluded, "The issuance of these patents reinforces Tenon's focus on innovation while simultaneously protecting our technology platform which strengthens our competitive position in the industry."

author: Data Bridge Market Research (DBMR)
title: Solar Microinverter and Power Optimizer Market to Surge to USD
text:
Solar Microinverter and Power Optimizer Market to Surge to USD 2.15 Billion by 2029, Driven by a 10.60% CAGR from 2022, Up from USD 960 Million in 2021 10-17-2024 11:06 PM CET | Business, Economy, Finances, Banking & Insurance
Press release from: Data Bridge Market Research (DBMR) / PR Agency: Data Bridge Market Research (DBMR)
The Solar Microinverter and Power Optimizer Market sector is undergoing significant transformation, with substantial growth and technological advancements expected by 2031. According to a new in-depth market research report, the sector is poised for expansion, driven by various factors such as market size, share, and emerging trends.
This comprehensive report provides key insights into the Solar Microinverter and Power Optimizer market, exploring critical market segmentation and definitions. It highlights the essential components driving growth, offering a clear picture of the industry's trajectory. Utilizing SWOT and PESTEL analyses, the report evaluates the market's strengths, weaknesses, opportunities, and threats, while also considering political, economic, social, technological, environmental, and legal factors that impact the market landscape.
The study offers valuable insights into the competitive landscape, highlighting recent developments and geographical distribution across key regions. Expert competitor analysis provides a detailed understanding of market dynamics, offering strategic guidance for businesses and investors.
With robust analysis and future projections, this report serves as a vital resource for stakeholders looking to capitalize on emerging opportunities and navigate challenges in the Solar Microinverter and Power Optimizer market.
What is the projected market size & growth rate of the Solar Microinverter and Power Optimizer Market?
Market Analysis and Size
The micro inverters and power optimizers have been successful in small scale roof-top installations such as residential and commercial installations due to their ability to generate extra energy yields by minimizing the impact of multi-pitch roofs, soiled or mis-performing modules, and shading mismatch. The growing adoption of higher power modules (300 W+) in residential installations has helped MLPE solutions become more cost-competitive over the years. These determinants will significantly aid the market traction over the forecast timeframe.
Global Solar Microinverter and Power Optimizer Market was valued at USD 960.00 million in 2021 and is expected to reach USD 2,149.38 million by 2029, registering a CAGR of 10.60% during the forecast period of 2022-2029. In addition to the market insights such as market value, growth rate, market segments, geographical coverage, market players, and market scenario, the market report curated by the Data Bridge Market Research team also includes technological advancements, regulatory framework, PESTEL, porter's five forces analysis, industry standards-at a glance, raw material costs/ operational expenditure-overview, supply chain analysis, vendor selection criteria, pricing analysis, production analysis, and climate chain scenario.
Market Definition
A solar microinverter and power optimizer is a mechanical device that uses thermal energy to perform mechanical work from a rotating output shaft. A solar microinverter and power optimizer is made up of a boiler, turbine, condenser, feed pump, and numerous other components. Solar microinverter and power optimizers are powered by a heated, gaseous stream that flows from the turbine's revolving blades. The steam spins the blades continually, transforming the bulk of the steam's energy into kinetic energy. It is used to generate electricity by powering a generator. Thermal energy, the most frequently used energy source for electricity generation worldwide and has the biggest installed capacity of any other source, is used to power solar microinverter and power optimizers.

author: Mayte Padron
title: Annual â€˜Walk the Talk for Epilepsyâ€™ to be held Apr. 20
text:
MIAMI-DADE COUNTY, Fla. â€“ Hosted by Epilepsy Alliance Florida, the annual Walk the Talk for Epilepsy is the largest community event in the area that raises awareness and funds for people living with the neurological disease.
The two-mile walk will take place this Saturday at Zoo Miami, located at 12400 SW 152nd St. Local 10 reporter Saira Anwer will serve as the emcee.
Recommended Videos
â€œThose who are living with epilepsy have to walk a tough path each and every day,â€ said Karen Basha Egozi, President and CEO of Epilepsy Alliance Florida. â€œWalking together in unity, this event symbolizes the support we provide to the more than half a million Floridians impacted by this disease and raises critical awareness of it in our local communities.â€
(Epilepsy Alliance Florida) Among the family-friendly entertainment, music and special character appearances, the walk will highlight the journey of 16-year-old Jose Pablo Saenz, whoâ€™s been living with drug-resistant epilepsy for almost 10 years.
Saenz will be honored with the Epilepsy Alliance Floridaâ€™s Clayton Feig Youth Award, an award commemorating youth who battle seizures and that highlights the important work of those dedicated to removing the stigma associated with epilepsy.
â€œFor Joseâ€™s family, support has extended beyond the operating room, not only from their medical team at Nicklaus Childrenâ€™s Hospital but Epilepsy Alliance Florida,â€ added Egozi. â€œThey are grateful for all the activities the Alliance offers, especially opportunities where Jose can be around others just like him â€“ like the Miami Walk the Talk for Epilepsy.â€
Registration for the walk kicks off at 7:30 a.m. To participate and find out more, visit walkthetalk.org .

title: Infosys lays off around 40 trainees; offers professional outplacement services as support - The Economic Times
text: IT major Infosys on Wednesday sent out emails to around 40-45 trainees informing them of discontinuation of their training contracts for failing the companyâ€™s final internal assessment process.Infosys layoff detailsâ€œFurther to the announcement of the results of your final assessment attempt, please be informed that you have not met the qualifying criteria in the â€˜Foundation skills training programâ€™ despite the additional preparation time, doubt-clearing sessions and several mock assessments opportunities,â€ the email sent to the trainees read.As a result, you will not be able to continue your journey in the apprenticeship program,â€ the email read. ET has reviewed the email.Besides counselling support, as part of the process, the Bengaluru-headquartered IT giant said it has planned for professional outplacement services to support the trainees.Additionally, the affected trainees have been offered an alternative career pathway, by taking an Infosys sponsored 12-week external training program for potential roles in the Business Process Management (BPM) industry. On successful completion of this training, the candidates could also apply to Infosys BPM Ltd.Infosys did not respond to queries concerning the fresh developments.Previous instance of job cuts by InfosysAround February 7, Infosys had asked around 350 trainees to resign, terming that they failed to qualify their internal assessment programme in three attempts.Infosys in a statement had said it has a rigorous hiring process and freshers, â€œafter undergoing extensive foundational trainingâ€, are expected to clear internal assessments. â€œAll freshers get three attempts to clear the assessment, failing which they will not be able to continue with the organisation, as is also mentioned in their contract,â€ the company said, adding that this process â€œensures a high quality of talent availability for our clientsâ€.
